name: Mouse House (itch) (alexpritc)
description:
Introducing my final year dissertation project: Mouse House is an interior design app for both experienced mouse owners and newcomers.

  1.  Pick an enclosure.
  2.  Select items from the in-game catalog to add.
  3. Change the colour of any item to create themes or match items you own in real life.
  4. Take screenshots and share with your friends.
Controls DescriptionKey bindingRotate around enclosureMiddle mouse buttonZoom in/outScroll wheel
Select objects/UILeft clickRotate objectsRight clickPause gameEscape
